DOC.brief_summary: This current study tests whether the load-displacement and stress-strain characteristics of human bicep and tricep muscles and tendons change during graded maximal voluntary elbow extension and flexion exercises.
DOC.brief_title: Tendon Mechanical Properties and Morphological Characteristics of Human Bicep and Tricep Muscles: An In Vivo Ultrasonographical Study
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subjects Age range from 1835 years History of shoulder/elbow which needs medical treatment or surgery
